page.title: 11LAW AND ORDER
page.content: The organisation of the police force is led by the superintendant centred in Consett,his deputy is the Chief Inspector,then four inspectors and 16 sergeants each with 4 to 8 constables in their charge.In our block we have two sergeants with 8 men.three on foot patrol who discuss problems in the street and a mobile Panda patrol who deal with road accidents,fire reports and deaths or sickness among old people.Crime is double that of neighbouring blocks and is increasing. {THEFT}is the commonest crime committed by the 12-14 age group with shoplifting.Prosecution can be made to those over 10 upto 16. Seventeen and over can receive detention or prison. {CRIMINAL DAMAGE }is second with vandalism destroying property with grafitti or fire.If the cost is over Â£20 the C.I.D investigates.
